thread.title: 'Make America Great Again' Dress: Joy Villa Supports Trump at Grammys 2017
thread.title_full: 'Make America Great Again' Dress: Joy Villa Supports Trump at Grammys 2017

author: Just Jared
title: 'Make America Great Again' Dress: Joy Villa Supports Trump at Grammys 2017
text:
Singer Joy Villa makes a political statement while stepping out on the red carpet at the 2017 Grammy Awards held at the Staples Center on Sunday (February 12) in Los Angeles.
The 25-year-old singer wore a dress with President Trump ‘s “Make America Great Again” slogan emblazoned on the front and his name written on the bottom.
Joy has not been nominated for a Grammy, but she calls herself a “Grammy considered recording artist” in her Twitter bio. She also considers herself to be a feminist, which is coming under scrutiny on social media after her outfit choice for the awards show.
Joy ‘s Wikipedia page was taken over after she walked the carpet and people changed her page to say her stage name is “Princess Trump.”
15+ pictures inside of Joy Villa on the red carpet…
